alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Assumption; Iberville (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 17 at 6:56PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Louisiana, including the following parishes, Ascension, Assumption and Iberville. * WHEN...Until 815 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 656 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, St. Gabriel, Belle Rose, Geismar and Paincourtville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
